definition: Sun Yue (1973-), PRC female pop star/Sun Yue (1985-), PRC basketball star

sentences.english: According to the rumor, Sun Yue will be transfered to the low level league NBDL for the more experiences.
sentences.chinese: 据传孙悦会被下放到低一级别的NBDL去积累经验。

sentences.english: Mihm passed back to Sun for a 16-foot jumper.
sentences.chinese: 米姆把球回传给孙悦，孙悦16尺中投得手。

sentences.english: Mihm passed back to Sun for a 16-foot jumper.
sentences.chinese: 米姆把球回传给孙悦，孙悦16尺中投得手。

sentences.english: He added that Sun has played professionally and that "he's got a lot of moxie."
sentences.chinese: “他又补充说，孙悦打的很专业，”他有充沛的精力。

sentences.english: But for now, for this special moment, Sun has played in an NBA game.
sentences.chinese: 但现在，在这特殊的时刻，孙悦上场打NBA比赛了。

sentences.english: Sun probably will play a few games on the Lakers' NBA Development League team, the D-Fenders.
sentences.chinese: 孙悦可能会在湖人下属的防守者队打上那么几场比赛。

definition: Yao Ming (1980-), retired Chinese basketball player, played for CBA Shanghai Sharks 1997-2002 and for NBA Houston Rockets 2002-2011
Yi Jianlian (1987-), Chinese basketball player for the New Jersey Nets (NBA)
Lu Chen (1976-), PRC figure skater, 1995 world champion
Coco Lee (1975-), pop singer, songwriter and actress
Christine Fan (1976-), American-born Taiwanese singer and actress
Jeremy Lin (1988-), Taiwanese-American professional basketball player (NBA)
Wang Zhizhi (1977-), former Chinese basketball player
Tian Liang (1979-), former male Chinese diver, Olympic medalist
